update BSE.T_BAS_SALES_DEPARTMENT
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LEAVE = #{leave,jdbcType=CHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
